headline: Show HN: Flying Carpet iOS, file transfer to Windows and Linux, no internet reqd
description: If you've ever wanted to transfer files directly between iOS and Windows/Linux without using the internet or setting up a SMB share on a WiFi network, try it out! Desktop versions at https://github.com/spieglt/flyingcarpet.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 飞毯iOS，文件传输到Windows和Linux，不需要互联网。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 飛毯iOS，文件傳輸到Windows和Linux，不需要互聯網。
description_zh-Hans: If you've ever wanted to transfer files directly between iOS and Windows/Linux without using the internet or setting up a SMB share on a WiFi network, try it out! Desktop versions at https://github.com/spieglt/flyingcarpet.
